statements: SELECT * FROM Recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, origin_country FROM Recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, creator FROM Recipes WHERE creator IS NOT NULL;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Mexico' AND creator = 'Maria';
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, origin_country FROM Recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, creator FROM Recipes WHERE creator LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Mexico' ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%tomato%' ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecipeOrigin;
SELECT recipe_name, origin_country FROM RecipeOrigin WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM RecipeOrigin ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, event_date FROM RecipeOrigin JOIN RecipeHistory ON RecipeOrigin.recipe_id = RecipeHistory.recipe_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recipes FROM RecipeOrigin;
SELECT recipe_name, origin_country FROM RecipeOrigin WHERE origin_country = 'Italy'
SELECT * FROM RecipeOrigin ORDER BY recipe_name DESC
SELECT * FROM RecipeOrigin WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(*) FROM RecipeOrigin GROUP BY recipe_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT recipe_name, event_date, event_description FROM RecipeOrigin JOIN RecipeHistory ON RecipeOrigin.recipe_id = RecipeHistory.recipe_id WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, origin_country FROM Recipe ORDER BY create_date DESC;
SELECT chef_name, recipe_name, origin_country FROM Recipe WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE category = 'Dairy';
SELECT history_id, recipe_id, modification_date FROM RecipeHistory ORDER BY modification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name FROM Recipe WHERE chef_name LIKE 'Gordon%';
SELECT recipe_name, create_date FROM Recipe ORDER BY create_date DESC;
SELECT r.recipe_name, i.ingredient_name, i.category FROM Recipe r INNER JOIN Ingredient i ON r.recipe_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT r.recipe_name, rh.modification_date, rh.modification_details FROM Recipe r INNER JOIN RecipeHistory rh ON r.recipe_id = rh.recipe_id WHERE rh.modification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recipe_origins;
SELECT origin_country, origin_region FROM recipe_origins WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_id, step_description, step_number FROM recipe_steps ORDER BY step_number DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_rating FROM recipe_reviews WHERE review_rating > 4;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recipe_origins WHERE origin_country='Italy';
SELECT recipe_id, origin_country FROM recipe_origins WHERE origin_region='Tuscany';
SELECT recipe_id, step_description FROM recipe_steps WHERE step_number=1;
SELECT recipe_id, reviewer_name, review_rating FROM recipe_reviews WHERE review_rating > 4;
SELECT recipe_id, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipe_ingredients WHERE recipe_id=123;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, origin_country FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, rating FROM recipes JOIN recipe_reviews ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_reviews.recipe_id
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, origin_country FROM recipes WHERE origin_country = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, step_description FROM recipes JOIN cooking_steps ON recipes.recipe_id = cooking_steps.recipe_id;

SELECT recipes.recipe_name, SUM(ingredients.ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients FROM recipes JOIN recipe_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON recipe_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id GROUP BY recipes.recipe_name;
SELECT recipe_name, rating FROM recipes JOIN recipe_reviews ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_reviews.recipe_id WHERE rating > 4;
